Reviews.Author: marianna_thess
Reviews.Content: Sultanahment is the first area you want to be in when you visit Istanbul. Agia Sophia, Blue Mosque, Hipodromus... you can visit all these in a walking distance from Basileus hotel. There is also a tram line very close to the hotel, that you will find very helpful, but taxis are also chip and frequent. The hotel stuff is always willing to call a taxi for you and give the driver directions. The rooms are cosy and clean and tasteful, and it will the best sleep you will ever have! Great breaksfast, meets any need (but don't eat too much, you are going to eat all day anyway!!). Really reasonable price also. I kept the best for last: at Basileus hotel, you will meet some great people, who will care to make your vacation unforgetable.. always willing to help, to offer, to suggest the best.. We hope to go back... soon!

Reviews.Title: “Great location, excellent value”
Reviews.Author: maui50
Reviews.Content: The location of this hotel is fantastic - a short walk uphill to the HIppodrome and Blue Mosque; all the other major sights in Sultanahmet are then within a stone's throw of those two sights. This alone, and the price per night, should make you at least consider staying here if you're a tourist in town for a short time. Saying that, the street the hotel is on is quite rundown - it didn't feel unsafe even at night, but it's not exactly a glamorous street. But then you're not far from the nice area around the HIppodrome. It's a somewhat quiet street in terms of traffic so it's ok but not ideal if you're a light sleeper. The rooms are not very big and the furniture is basic but new, and therefore in good nick at the moment. Wifi signal was good and quite fast, at least while I was there. Bear in mind that the hotel has been open less than 6 months and has a few things to improve; I relayed my views back to the friendly owners/receptionists, who welcome constructive criticism at this early stage. There were small details e.g. hot food is available at breakfast but as this isn't advertised, you don't know about it until someone remembers to ask you if you want hot food. Just an unintentional oversight on their part, not a deal breaker. Oversights like that are easily rectified by this young hotel but the things that are harder to change - location, price point, determination and friendliness of staff - are all first class and what you'd expect from a good hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Oustanding service and a great location”
Reviews.Author: tree27
Reviews.Content: To the person who questions whether the reviews are genuine. They are. I've stayed at a bunch of places I've found on tripadvisor and write up those which are particularly bad or good. This is most definitely the latter. Service is incredible. Very knowledeable and friendly front desk who cannot do enough to help. They arranged a couple of trips for us and recommended local restaurants taking the time and effort to really understand our needs and our budget. This place deserves its postive reviews for sure.

Reviews.Title: “Best service ever!”
Reviews.Author: viviajar
Reviews.Content: We chose BAsileus Hotel because the reviews from TA were great and we were not disapointed at all! The service is perfect, the rooms are brand new, clean and cozy, the breakfast is nice and the location is great. When we go back to Turkey some day Basileus hotel will be our home in Istanbul!

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic service, care, kindness and value for money.”
Reviews.Author: ndirande
Reviews.Content: This is a gem of a hotel. From the outset when the taxi driver got lost and the hotel manager and owner set out to find us, it was great. The room was spotless, the breakfast lovely and nothing was ever too much trouble. look no further, this is a brilliant little place. Yusuf the manager is a real professional and has a great eye for detail, the rest of the staff were happy and helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Welcome respite from a day's travels”
Reviews.Author: jameoz
Reviews.Content: We booked our stay at Basileus at the last moment and it lived very much up to expectations! The GM, Yusuf, was extremely welcoming and warm, and we were made to feel at home during our stay. The hotel is located within walking distance of historical Istanbul and walking past the Sultanahmet Mosque everyday was an experience in itself. We took a train from the airport and walked from the tram line to Basileus with little difficulty (note: the hotel is located in an area where there are numerous other hotels around, so just ask anyone around the area and they will be able to direct you) The rooms are spotless and new, and breakfast was an extremely enjoyable experience and something to look forward to at the start of the day. The free wifi was fast and reliable. Yusuf was extremely helpful in helping to book tours on request (e.g. Bosphorus Cruise etc) and his fellow colleagues gave excellent recommendations on food and other places to explore. We stayed for 9 days and it was a wonderful experience. If Basileus is able to provide such consistent quality and value as experienced, I am certain it will do well in the years to come. Definitely looking forward to coming back to Istanbul! Thanks Basileus!

Reviews.Title: “Could not recommend this hotel more... a place you will want to return!”
Reviews.Author: Kirsten1975
Reviews.Content: This was my first time in Istanbul and I could not have found a better place to stay than the Basileus..... this newly opened hotel is warm, friendly and inviting, our room was bright, sunny, incredibly comfortable and spotlessly clean, and the staff & owners are fantastic- they are friendly, welcoming, very knowledgeable about the city and willing to help with any information or suggestions you may need- the ultimate hosts, they will truly make you feel at home. A delicious breakfast is served in the morning, with a variety of fruit, bread, eggs, cheeses, yogurt, honey, coffee, juices- a perfect start to a day exploring this amazing city. Highly recommend this hotel!!!

Reviews.Title: “Can't ask for more!”
Reviews.Author: m1990
Reviews.Content: This hotel can be the start of any amazing trip to Istanbul for many reasons. The atmosphere is welcoming, staff helpful and hospitable, rooms clean and cosy, location central. So that is why a day starting from Basilius wouldn't be like a normal day. Thanks for keeping the standards high with the prices so reasonable.
